2072990.name: Cuphead DLC - Official Soundtrack
2072990.description:
Composed by Kristofer Maddigan, the Cuphead - The Delicious Last Course OST features an additional bevy of original jazz, early big band, and ragtime music. For this soundtrack we have explored an even wider range of musical inspirations to give each song a rich, full sound. Each song is played by live musicians and a whopping 110+ performers contributed to this album.

Available in FLAC and MP3 320 kbps formats.
